column1: #COVID19 #Rwanda Day 75 Rwanda has recorded the first deaths of #coronavirus . The victim is a 65-year-old Rwandan truck driver. Total cases: 359 Active cases: 108 New cases: 04 Recovered: 250 (New 03) Death: 1 #RwOT #COVIDãƒ¼19 #staysafe #SaveLives
